reviewText: Bought this through amazon. Love this shoe . bought a taupe and a black pair. They have good arch support and can wear with dress or slacks..
I have worn these off and on all summer. They are comfortable. They keep their shape and color well. Nice purchase.

I bought these shoes for my mom, and she is the pickiest shoe shopper ever! She absolutely loves the comfort of these shoes and hadnt been able to find them for years! Good thing there is amazon! She hasn't been able to find shoes as comfortable! She says size are true to size, and she wants me to buy another two pairs! Good to know I've made my mom happy!
I like the shoes and over all they are pretty comfortable. They are easy and nice but a little narrow
summary: a little narrow for a C

reviewerName: ScaperGal Farscape is still awesome. Get th...
reviewText: I love these shoes for work but they are a bit pricey. I bought a pair in black and navy - bye-bye $135 plus tax.I wish they came in a brown but the nearest they have is taupe or bronze and they are rarely available in my size... 9W. The bronze has been unavailable in my size almost a year.They are fairly true to size but still take a bit of wear before they are comfortable.They tend to pinch on the toes and I've had to treat several painful blisters as a result.I like the arch support and the small heel.The only drawback apart from the price is that the lining comes loose very quickly and then slides around inside the shoe which is uncomfortable and annoying.
I bought these to wear for my fraternal organization meetings. I like the shoe, but the plastic heel is more beige in appearance than white. I'll use them for my local meetings.

I have been looking for a shoe that I could be comfortable in. I have a wide foot, a bunion, and a ugly hammertoe,. I could never find a shoe that didn't bother one or the other until now. I love softspots anyway, but this shoe is perfect for me.

These shoes are smart looking and can take you anywhere! I had to get a double wide to accommodate my flip-flops all my life wide feet, but they are like walking on pillows! Comfort at a decent price!
